mapper.insert: insert into TRSSEventInvolvedPersons (SSEPersonsID, SSEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact) values (#{ssEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ssEventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TRSSEventInvolvedPersons set SSEventID = #{ssEventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, InvolvedPersonCertID = #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, InvolvedPersonName = #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonRemark = #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonContact = #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SSEPersonsID = #{ssEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SSEPersonsID, SSEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSSEventInvolvedPersons where SSEPersonsID = #{SSEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select SSEPersonsID, SSEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSSEventInvolvedPersons where SSEventID = #{id}
select SSEPersonsID, SSEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSSEventInvolvedPersons
